vendors.name: Apple Vintage Collection
vendors.description: Early Apple computers, peripherals, and rare prototypes from Cupertino

items.name: Apple II Plus

items.name: Apple Lisa Mouse
items.description: Original Lisa mouse - predecessor to the Macintosh mouse

responses.text: Tell me about early Apple history

vendors.name: Byte Shop Classics

items.description: The computer that started the microcomputer revolution

items.name: IMSAI 8080

vendors.name: Commodore Corner
vendors.description: Complete line of Commodore computers from PET to Amiga

items.name: Commodore 64
items.description: Best-selling single computer model of all time

dialog.greeting: Hello! Commodore Corner has the complete evolution of Commodore business machines!

vendors.name: Digital Equipment Depot
vendors.description: Professional DEC minicomputers and terminals from the enterprise era

items.description: Legendary minicomputer that ran early Unix systems

items.name: DEC VT100 Terminal
items.description: The terminal that defined computer interfaces

dialog.greeting: Welcome to Digital Equipment Depot! Experience the power of professional minicomputers!

vendors.name: Early Electronics

dialog.greeting: Greetings electronics enthusiast! Early Electronics has components from computing's DIY roots!

vendors.name: Fairchild & Friends

items.description: Actual silicon wafer from 1970s chip production

dialog.greeting: Welcome! Fairchild & Friends celebrates the semiconductor revolution that made computing possible!

vendors.name: Laptop Legacy
vendors.description: Early portable computers and laptops from the dawn of mobile computing

vendors.name: Microprocessor Museum
vendors.description: Historic CPUs and microprocessors that powered the computer revolution

items.description: Influential 8-bit processor used in many early computers

items.name: Zilog Z80 CPU
items.description: Popular 8-bit processor that powered CP/M systems

dialog.greeting: Welcome to Microprocessor Museum! These tiny chips changed the world forever!
